ProductInfo.Features:
GW7204C: Professional 4 Channel H.264 960H & D1 Realtime DVR with HDMI & VGA. 960×480 & 30FPS recording. 4CH WD1 Recroding + 4 CH WD1 Playback. iPhone, Android Viewing. New color graphical menu. Network live, backup, playback, USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control
GW630C: 1/3" CMOS Outdoor Camera, 650 TV lines, 3.6mm Lens, 30 IR LEDs, 82 ft IR Distance. Low Illumination 0.1 Lux. Metal vandal proof & water proof
GW734V: Professional indoor dome camera with Microphone, 1/3" SHARP CCD, 600 TV lines, 3.6mm Lens, 24 IR LEDs. Low Illumination 0 Lux (with IR LED on).
Package Includes:     GW7204C DVR with 500GB HDD;     GWLED19IN  - Free 19" Wide Screen LED monitor;     2 x GW630C - 1/3" CMOS CCD Camera;     2 x GW734V - 1/3" SHARP CCD Camera;
1 x GW100CAW: 100 feet pre-made cable BNC;     2 x GW60CAW: 60 feet pre-made cable BNC;     1 x GW25CAW: 25 feet pre-made cable BNC;     1 x GW12V2A: 12V2A Power Supply for Security Cameras;     1 x GW124CA: 1 to 4 Power Splitter Adapter Cables.
ProductInfo.Name: GW Security Inc 4CHP5 4Ch H.264 960H & D1 Realtime DVR with 2x 650TVL Waterproof Camera and 2x 600TVL buildin microphone Security Camera, Free LED (Black/White)
